org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom

Class RecipeHandlerMachine<M extends IMachine<M,I,O,P>,I extends IRecipeInput,O extends IRecipeOutput,P extends IRecipeProperties>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.recipe.custom.RecipeHandlerMachine<M,I,O,P>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - The type of the machine.
    I - The type of the recipe input of all recipes associated with the machine.
    O - The type of the recipe output of all recipes associated with the machine.
    P - The type of the recipe properties of all recipes associated with the machine.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler.IRecipeHandler

    public abstract class RecipeHandlerMachine<M extends IMachine<M,I,O,P>,I extends IRecipeInput,O extends IRecipeOutput,P extends IRecipeProperties>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.cyclops.commoncapabilities.api.capability.recipehandler.IRecipeHandler
    An adapter class for exposing an IMachine as an IRecipeHandler.
